rules: when command is jira:list must have jira:read
list.description: List Jira issues assigned to a person

rules: when command is jira:watch must have jira:update_self or jira:update_any
watch.description: Add yourself to watch list of a Jira issue

rules: when command is jira:assign with arg[1]=='to' and arg[2]=='me' must have jira:update_self or jira:update_any
when command is jira:assign with arg[1]=='me' must have jira:update_self or jira:update_any
when command is jira:assign with arg[1]!='me' and arg[2]!='me' must have jira:update_any
assign.description: Assign Jira issue to a person

rules: when command is jira:get must have jira:read

env.description: Username to authenticate with for Jira Instance
Password to authenticate with for Jira Instance
Token to authenticate with for Cog Service API
